game.name: The Hive Pandemic
game.shortDescription: The Hive is Calling. Do You Have the Will to Resist? The fight for survival begins on Mars, but the war will take you back to Earth—where the infection is already spreading. With every battle, every mind you enter, and every secret you uncover, the Hive grows stronger. Are you just the next host?
